about_the_game:
Explore a ruined modern city! The Urban Decay tileset for RPG Maker will give you plenty of broken-down, scratched-up, bombed-out tiles to help you expand your modern stories.

The Urban Decay Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Water, green/toxic water, grass, sand, concrete, asphalt, dirt, stone, several green ground covers for variety, fences, broken ground, wildflowers and more! Also includes plenty of road stripes.

Walls/roofs:

Tons of wall types in stucco, log cabin, metal building, wood planks, stone of lots of kinds. 10+ wall types (not including color variations). You also get clay tile roof, wood plank roof, metal, three types of shingles, and 10 types of walkable roofs. All have dirty, rough edges to blend in with the decayed environment.

Shingle and metal roofs include shadow side tiles. Also includes peaked roof tiles you can overlay to bring a lot more variety to your roofing.

Wall tiles also include variable-width windows in multiple colors.

Make lots of roads:

signage (with broken and half-buried signs)
road stripes (faded)
traffic lights (with broken versions)
manhole covers and other details
guard rails (some bent)
barricades (also broken)
and more!

Neighborhood tiles now featuring dirt, grime, cracks and general brokenness:

chain link fence
stone arch
picnic tables
fountain
playground equipment (swings, seesaw, whole playground units)
kids toys
statues
and more!

Broken-down vehicles for extra authenticity:

electronic direction sign
crane
cement mixer
RV
two cars
and more!

And details to make your downtown areas look extra rough:

trash and dumpsters
graffiti
cracked and busted storefronts
canopies and awnings
seating
lighting
trees (with dead version)
ice machine, gumball machine, vending machine, etc
more windows, some with merchandise
holes and cracks…stack them up for more variety!

Events and Animations

12 animated doors, one lit, one not!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
